attributes.action: protect the Lottery funding of 'Good Causes' from being raided by the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition requests that Parliament ensures the present percentage of funds raised by the National Lottery that goes to support charities is maintained. The 'Good Causes' fund should not be raided to pay for the London Olympics as many charity projects supporting disadvantaged people depend on the availability of Lottery funding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
